query:
UPDATE items
            SET sku = $2, name = $3, description = $4, category = $5, unit = $6, barcode = $7,
                cost_price = $8, sale_price = $9, reorder_point = $10, reorder_qty = $11,
                weight = $12, dimensions = $13, metadata = $14, active = $15, updated_at = $16
            WHERE id = $1
